targets.rawSql: SELECT count(*) AS total_orders FROM (SELECT order_id FROM food_orders WHERE $__timeFilter(date_of_invoice) AND (0 IN ($customer) OR customer_id IN ($customer)) UNION ALL SELECT order_id FROM instamart_orders WHERE $__timeFilter(date_of_invoice) AND (0 IN ($customer) OR customer_id IN ($customer))) combined;

SELECT round(sum(total)::numeric, 2) AS grand_total FROM (SELECT invoice_total AS total FROM food_orders WHERE $__timeFilter(date_of_invoice) AND (0 IN ($customer) OR customer_id IN ($customer)) UNION ALL SELECT invoice_value FROM instamart_orders WHERE $__timeFilter(date_of_invoice) AND (0 IN ($customer) OR customer_id IN ($customer))) combined;

SELECT date_trunc('month', date_of_invoice) AS time, round(sum(invoice_total)::numeric, 2) AS food_spend FROM food_orders WHERE $__timeFilter(date_of_invoice) AND (0 IN ($customer) OR customer_id IN ($customer)) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1;

SELECT date_trunc('month', date_of_invoice) AS time, round(sum(invoice_value)::numeric, 2) AS instamart_spend FROM instamart_orders WHERE $__timeFilter(date_of_invoice) AND (0 IN ($customer) OR customer_id IN ($customer)) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1;
SELECT count(*) AS food_orders FROM food_orders WHERE $__timeFilter(date_of_invoice) AND (0 IN ($customer) OR customer_id IN ($customer));
SELECT count(*) AS instamart_orders FROM instamart_orders WHERE $__timeFilter(date_of_invoice) AND (0 IN ($customer) OR customer_id IN ($customer));

SELECT 'Food' AS type, round(sum(invoice_total)::numeric, 2) AS spend FROM food_orders WHERE $__timeFilter(date_of_invoice) AND (0 IN ($customer) OR customer_id IN ($customer)) UNION ALL SELECT 'Instamart', round(sum(invoice_value)::numeric, 2) FROM instamart_orders WHERE $__timeFilter(date_of_invoice) AND (0 IN ($customer) OR customer_id IN ($customer));

SELECT month, coalesce(food_orders, 0) AS food_orders, coalesce(instamart_orders, 0) AS instamart_orders FROM (SELECT date_trunc('month', date_of_invoice)::date AS month, count(*) AS food_orders FROM food_orders WHERE $__timeFilter(date_of_invoice) AND (0 IN ($customer) OR customer_id IN ($customer)) GROUP BY 1) f FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT date_trunc('month', date_of_invoice)::date AS month, count(*) AS instamart_orders FROM instamart_orders WHERE $__timeFilter(date_of_invoice) AND (0 IN ($customer) OR customer_id IN ($customer)) GROUP BY 1) i USING (month) ORDER BY month;

SELECT date_trunc('week', date_of_invoice) AS time, round(sum(invoice_total)::numeric, 2) AS food_spend FROM food_orders WHERE $__timeFilter(date_of_invoice) AND (0 IN ($customer) OR customer_id IN ($customer)) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1;

SELECT date_trunc('week', date_of_invoice) AS time, round(sum(invoice_value)::numeric, 2) AS instamart_spend FROM instamart_orders WHERE $__timeFilter(date_of_invoice) AND (0 IN ($customer) OR customer_id IN ($customer)) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1;

SELECT 'Food' AS type, count(*) AS orders, round(sum(invoice_total)::numeric, 2) AS total_spend, round(avg(invoice_total)::numeric, 2) AS avg_order, round(min(invoice_total)::numeric, 2) AS min_order, round(max(invoice_total)::numeric, 2) AS max_order FROM food_orders WHERE $__timeFilter(date_of_invoice) AND (0 IN ($customer) OR customer_id IN ($customer)) UNION ALL SELECT 'Instamart', count(*), round(sum(invoice_value)::numeric, 2), round(avg(invoice_value)::numeric, 2), round(min(invoice_value)::numeric, 2), round(max(invoice_value)::numeric, 2) FROM instamart_orders WHERE $__timeFilter(date_of_invoice) AND (0 IN ($customer) OR customer_id IN ($customer));

SELECT restaurant_name, count(*) AS orders, round(sum(invoice_total)::numeric, 2) AS total_spend, round(avg(invoice_total)::numeric, 2) AS avg_order, min(date_of_invoice) AS first_order, max(date_of_invoice) AS last_order FROM food_orders WHERE $__timeFilter(date_of_invoice) AND (0 IN ($customer) OR customer_id IN ($customer)) GROUP BY restaurant_name ORDER BY total_spend DESC;

SELECT restaurant_name, count(*) AS order_count FROM food_orders WHERE $__timeFilter(date_of_invoice) AND (0 IN ($customer) OR customer_id IN ($customer)) GROUP BY restaurant_name HAVING count(*) > 1 ORDER BY order_count DESC;

SELECT fi.description, sum(fi.quantity) AS total_qty, count(DISTINCT fi.order_id) AS in_orders, round(avg(fi.unit_price)::numeric, 2) AS avg_unit_price, round(sum(fi.net_assessable_value)::numeric, 2) AS total_spend FROM food_order_items fi JOIN food_orders fo ON fi.order_id = fo.order_id WHERE $__timeFilter(fo.date_of_invoice) AND (0 IN ($customer) OR fo.customer_id IN ($customer)) AND fi.description NOT ILIKE '%packing%' GROUP BY fi.description ORDER BY total_qty DESC LIMIT 20;

SELECT
      fi.description AS metric,
      round(sum(fi.net_assessable_value)::numeric, 2) AS total_spend
  FROM food_order_items fi
  JOIN food_orders fo ON fi.order_id = fo.order_id
  WHERE $__timeFilter(fo.date_of_invoice)
    AND (0 IN ($customer) OR fo.customer_id IN ($customer))
  GROUP BY fi.description
  ORDER BY total_spend DESC
  LIMIT 5;

SELECT restaurant_name, count(*) AS orders, 
round(sum(total_taxes)::numeric, 2) AS total_tax, 
round(sum(invoice_total)::numeric, 2) AS total_spend
FROM food_orders 
WHERE $__timeFilter(date_of_invoice) AND (0 IN ($customer) OR customer_id IN ($customer)) 
GROUP BY restaurant_name 
ORDER BY total_tax DESC;

SELECT date_trunc('month', date_of_invoice) AS time, round(sum(total_taxes)::numeric, 2) AS food_tax FROM food_orders WHERE $__timeFilter(date_of_invoice) AND (0 IN ($customer) OR customer_id IN ($customer)) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1;

SELECT seller_name, count(*) AS orders, round(sum(invoice_value)::numeric, 2) AS total_spend, round(avg(invoice_value)::numeric, 2) AS avg_order FROM instamart_orders WHERE $__timeFilter(date_of_invoice) AND (0 IN ($customer) OR customer_id IN ($customer)) GROUP BY seller_name ORDER BY total_spend DESC;

SELECT round(sum(hf.invoice_total)::numeric, 2) AS total_handling_fees 
FROM instamart_handling_fees hf JOIN instamart_orders io ON hf.order_id = io.order_id WHERE $__timeFilter(hf.date_of_invoice) AND (0 IN ($customer) OR io.customer_id IN ($customer));

SELECT ii.description, 
sum(ii.quantity) AS total_qty, 
count(DISTINCT ii.order_id) AS in_orders, 
round(avg(ii.taxable_value)::numeric, 2) AS avg_mrp
FROM instamart_order_items ii JOIN instamart_orders io ON ii.order_id = io.order_id 
WHERE $__timeFilter(io.date_of_invoice) AND (0 IN ($customer) OR io.customer_id IN ($customer)) 
GROUP BY ii.description ORDER BY total_qty DESC;

SELECT count(*) FILTER (WHERE hf.invoice_total > 0) AS PAID_FEE, count(*) FILTER (WHERE hf.invoice_total = 0) AS zero_fees, round(avg(hf.invoice_total) FILTER (WHERE hf.invoice_total > 0)::numeric, 2) AS avg_fee FROM instamart_handling_fees hf JOIN instamart_orders io ON hf.order_id = io.order_id WHERE $__timeFilter(hf.date_of_invoice) AND (0 IN ($customer) OR io.customer_id IN ($customer));

SELECT ii.description, sum(ii.quantity) AS qty, round(sum(ii.taxable_value)::numeric, 2) AS total_mrp, round(sum(ii.discount)::numeric, 2) AS total_discount, round((sum(ii.discount) / NULLIF(sum(ii.taxable_value), 0) * 100)::numeric, 1) AS discount_pct, round(sum(ii.total_amount)::numeric, 2) AS paid FROM instamart_order_items ii JOIN instamart_orders io ON ii.order_id = io.order_id WHERE $__timeFilter(io.date_of_invoice) AND (0 IN ($customer) OR io.customer_id IN ($customer)) GROUP BY ii.description ORDER BY total_discount DESC LIMIT 20;

SELECT date_trunc('month', hf.date_of_invoice) AS time, round(sum(hf.invoice_total)::numeric, 2) AS handling_fee FROM instamart_handling_fees hf JOIN instamart_orders io ON hf.order_id = io.order_id WHERE $__timeFilter(hf.date_of_invoice) AND hf.invoice_total > 0 AND (0 IN ($customer) OR io.customer_id IN ($customer)) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1;

SELECT date_trunc('month', io.date_of_invoice) AS time, round(sum(ii.discount)::numeric, 2) AS discount_saved, round(sum(ii.total_amount)::numeric, 2) AS amount_paid FROM instamart_orders io JOIN instamart_order_items ii ON io.order_id = ii.order_id WHERE $__timeFilter(io.date_of_invoice) AND (0 IN ($customer) OR io.customer_id IN ($customer)) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1;

SELECT date_of_invoice AS time, sum(invoice_total) OVER (ORDER BY date_of_invoice, order_id) AS cumulative_food FROM food_orders WHERE $__timeFilter(date_of_invoice) AND (0 IN ($customer) OR customer_id IN ($customer)) ORDER BY date_of_invoice;

SELECT date_of_invoice AS time, sum(invoice_value) OVER (ORDER BY date_of_invoice, order_id) AS cumulative_instamart FROM instamart_orders WHERE $__timeFilter(date_of_invoice) AND (0 IN ($customer) OR customer_id IN ($customer)) ORDER BY date_of_invoice;

SELECT CASE WHEN invoice_value < 300 THEN '< 300' WHEN invoice_value < 600 THEN '300-599' WHEN invoice_value < 1000 THEN '600-999' WHEN invoice_value < 2000 THEN '1000-1999' ELSE '2000+' END AS bucket, count(*) AS orders FROM instamart_orders WHERE $__timeFilter(date_of_invoice) AND (0 IN ($customer) OR customer_id IN ($customer)) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY min(invoice_value);

SELECT to_char(date_of_invoice, 'Day') AS day_name, count(*) AS orders, round(sum(total)::numeric, 2) AS total_spend, round(avg(total)::numeric, 2) AS avg_order FROM (SELECT date_of_invoice, invoice_total AS total FROM food_orders WHERE $__timeFilter(date_of_invoice) AND (0 IN ($customer) OR customer_id IN ($customer)) UNION ALL SELECT date_of_invoice, invoice_value FROM instamart_orders WHERE $__timeFilter(date_of_invoice) AND (0 IN ($customer) OR customer_id IN ($customer))) all_orders GROUP BY 1, extract(DOW FROM date_of_invoice) ORDER BY extract(DOW FROM date_of_invoice);

SELECT CASE WHEN invoice_total < 500 THEN '< 500' WHEN invoice_total < 1000 THEN '500-999' WHEN invoice_total < 1500 THEN '1000-1499' WHEN invoice_total < 2000 THEN '1500-1999' ELSE '2000+' END AS bucket, count(*) AS orders FROM food_orders WHERE $__timeFilter(date_of_invoice) AND (0 IN ($customer) OR customer_id IN ($customer)) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY min(invoice_total);

SELECT fi.description, count(DISTINCT date_trunc('month', fo.date_of_invoice)) AS months_ordered, sum(fi.quantity) AS total_qty, round(sum(fi.net_assessable_value)::numeric, 2) AS total_spend FROM food_order_items fi JOIN food_orders fo ON fi.order_id = fo.order_id WHERE $__timeFilter(fo.date_of_invoice) AND (0 IN ($customer) OR fo.customer_id IN ($customer)) AND fi.description NOT ILIKE '%packing%' GROUP BY fi.description HAVING count(DISTINCT date_trunc('month', fo.date_of_invoice)) >= 2 ORDER BY months_ordered DESC, total_spend DESC;

WITH avg_food AS (SELECT avg(invoice_total) AS avg_val FROM food_orders WHERE $__timeFilter(date_of_invoice) AND (0 IN ($customer) OR customer_id IN ($customer))), avg_instamart AS (SELECT avg(invoice_value) AS avg_val FROM instamart_orders WHERE $__timeFilter(date_of_invoice) AND (0 IN ($customer) OR customer_id IN ($customer))) SELECT 'Food' AS type, order_id::text, date_of_invoice, restaurant_name AS name, round(invoice_total::numeric, 2) AS amount, round((invoice_total / af.avg_val)::numeric, 1) AS times_avg FROM food_orders, avg_food af WHERE $__timeFilter(date_of_invoice) AND (0 IN ($customer) OR customer_id IN ($customer)) AND invoice_total > af.avg_val * 2 UNION ALL SELECT 'Instamart', order_id::text, date_of_invoice, seller_name, round(invoice_value::numeric, 2), round((invoice_value / ai.avg_val)::numeric, 1) FROM instamart_orders, avg_instamart ai WHERE $__timeFilter(date_of_invoice) AND (0 IN ($customer) OR customer_id IN ($customer)) AND invoice_value > ai.avg_val * 2 ORDER BY amount DESC;

list.definition: SELECT name AS __text, id::text AS __value FROM customers ORDER BY name
list.label: Customer
list.name: customer
list.query: SELECT name AS __text, id::text AS __value FROM customers ORDER BY name
